alert.note: Alert for Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 12:09PM CDT until April 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM CDT Monday was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 15.7 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 24.5 Mon 11 am CD 23.9 23.0 20.6 &&
